overview: What happens when two crews rob the same place at the same time?". CHAOS. A group of professional robbers find themselves in an interesting situation when they end up robbing the same location without a clue of how it happened.  Balaclavas galore.  Director  Sarah Vaughn Perry  Writer  Sarah Vaughn Perry  Stars  Sarah Vaughn PerryClifton JohnsonRickey Lee
title: The Odds
